text: An image portraying a whimsical situation where a frog, not more than few inches tall, is all geared up with swimming goggles. This little gastropod is embracing its adventurous side as it prepares for a swim. The background might feature typical elements of a human daily life, such as a large-size cup of morning coffee or a huge newspaper suggesting that the scene takes place on a human's desk. Elements such as pencils, stapler, or paper weights could also be scattered around, emphasizing the scale between the frog and its surroundings and the amusing contrast of this situation.
